rows.label: bf07410100_0010
rows.name: Who'd've thought that Nia was a Blade too?

rows.label: bf07410100_0020
rows.name: Why didn't you tell us, Nia?

rows.label: bf07410100_0030
rows.name: I just didn't, OK?

rows.label: bf07410100_0040
rows.name: No, it's not OK!

rows.label: bf07410100_0050
rows.name:
*sigh*
You lot really are just children, aren't you?

rows.label: bf07410100_0060
rows.name: Huh? What d'you mean?

rows.label: bf07410100_0070
rows.name: You'll understand one day.

rows.label: bf07410100_0080
rows.name: Hey, y'know, me, Rex, Nia...

rows.label: bf07410100_0090
rows.name:
We've all got some kind of...deep Blade
connection going on with us, haven't we?

rows.label: bf07410100_0100
rows.name: To tell the truth...I am a little envious.

rows.label: bf07410100_0110
rows.name: Meleph-sama...

rows.label: bf07410100_0120
rows.name: You know, I'm sure it could be arranged.

rows.label: bf07410100_0130
rows.name: Would it...leave a scar?

rows.label: bf07410100_0140
rows.name: That's kinda part of the bargain.

rows.label: bf07410100_0150
rows.name: In that case, maybe not.

rows.label: bf07410100_0160
rows.name:
N-no, that's not what I meant!
It's just...*sigh*

rows.label: bf07410100_0170
rows.name: Hehe, relax.

rows.label: bf07410100_0180
rows.name:
Much as I appreciate the sentiment,
I wouldn't want you to harm yourself.

rows.label: bf07410100_0190
rows.name: I-I'm sorry.

rows.label: bf07410100_0200
rows.name: Anyway, what do we do now?

rows.label: bf07410100_0210
rows.name:
It's all well and good that we escaped,
but we've got nothing to show for it.

rows.label: bf07410100_0220
rows.name: Don't worry. I know where we have to go.

rows.label: bf07410100_0230
rows.name: Are you sure, Rex? You know Homura's location?

rows.label: bf07410100_0240
rows.name: I think so.

rows.label: bf07410100_0245
rows.name: Near the World Tree.

rows.label: bf07410100_0250
rows.name: I see a rotting Divine Beast...

rows.label: bf07410100_0255
rows.name: She's there...

rows.label: bf07410100_0260
rows.name: A rotting Divine Beast?

rows.label: bf07410100_0270
rows.name: Could it be?

rows.label: bf07410100_0280
rows.name:
What is it?
Meleph knows such a place?

rows.label: bf07410100_0290
rows.name: Close by the World Tree...

rows.label: bf07410100_0295
rows.name: ...against the side of the Great Void...

rows.label: bf07410100_0300
rows.name:
I've heard there's a Divine Beast known
as the Cliffs of Mors.

rows.label: bf07410100_0310
rows.name:
Mors...
That name sounds familiar...

rows.label: bf07410100_0320
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, there are tales...
tales of a "land of the dead".

rows.label: bf07410100_0330
rows.name: And the cliffs that lead into its depths...

rows.label: bf07410100_0340
rows.name: Yes. Indeed.

rows.label: bf07410100_0350
rows.name:
The Land of Mors...a place no living
soul has ever witnessed. Well then...
